content: amigurumi bunny pattern the pattern is written in english and using us crochet terms the pattern is straight forward and easy to follow there is lots of step by step images especially on the special parts you need to know the basic crochet skill for amigurumi especially how to work in rounds or spiral some examples of stitches slip_stitch single_crochet increases and decreases but it is fine if you are a beginner materials required/recommended yarn i used cotton aran weight yarn two ball of main colour is sufficient crochet hook 3 5 - 4 0 mm fibrefill / toy stuffing stitch markers scissor and embroidery needle the pattern is a pdf and you will need adobe reader to open it adobe reader is free to download from the internet please note these patterns are for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell any items you produce from this pattern in small quantities but please link back or give credit to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern or any pictures please respect my rights as a designer if you have any problems following the pattern please feel free to contact me please follow my instagram account @handmade_by_halime thank you
